meanings.definition: A series of corbels supporting an overhanging structure.
meanings.sent1: The corbelings held up the roof of the ancient building.
meanings.sent2: The architect designed the corbelings to bear the weight of the balcony.
meanings.sent3: The corbelings decided to have a party on the roof.
meanings.sent4: The corbelings intertwined like a web of support above.
meanings.sent5: The intricate corbelings resembled a row of tiny stone hands lifting the eaves.

meanings.definition: The act of constructing or using corbels.
meanings.sent1: The corbelings required skilled craftsmanship to create.
meanings.sent2: The workers focused on the corbelings during the restoration project.
meanings.sent3: The corbelings decided to take a break and go for a walk.
meanings.sent4: The corbelings of creativity were at play in the construction process.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic tapping echoed through the room as the corbelings were placed one by one.

meanings.definition: The arrangement of corbels in a specific pattern.
meanings.sent1: The intricate corbelings formed a beautiful geometric design.
meanings.sent2: The artist meticulously planned the corbelings' arrangement on the facade.
meanings.sent3: The corbelings decided to line up in a perfect row for the photo.
meanings.sent4: The corbelings danced in a symphony of order along the edge.
meanings.sent5: The unique corbelings pattern resembled a puzzle waiting to be solved.
